newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - PictureTel Corp edges down.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - PictureTel Corp edges down.

text.p: PictureTel Corp was one of the few issues moving after the bell Wednesday, traders said, after the company earlier released fourth-quarter results.
PictureTel was trading at 18-3/8 after hours, down slightly from its regular-trading close of 18-9/16. The stock opened Wednesday at 18-5/8, and had been as low as 18-1/8.

The company reported fourth-quarter net income per share of $0.28, compared to $0.20 for the same period the year before. It also predicted that sales would be slightly lower in the first quarter of 1997 than in the previous quarter.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one volume was 179,300, compared to Tuesday's 282,090. Session two volume was 147,700, while on Tuesday it was 2,200,200.
